settings.text: “Welcome To The Ecomm Builder, Formerly Known As Shopify Queen”

settings.title: ABOUT US
settings.text:
The Ecomm Builder, LLC mission is to help individuals start or scale their existing businesses by providing quality products, services, and educational resources.

If you have any queries about our products or would like to check availability of an item, please use the CONTACT US to get in touch.

settings.fix_tab2_content:
Safety And Allergy Guidelines

The information on this website has been compiled from published sources and is provided only as a guide. Although we make every effort to ensure that the information published on this site is correct and up to date, We cannot guarantee the accuracy of all information presented. We do not accept any liability in respect of any omission or error. Customers should always take full responsibility for their choices. Our Company accepts no liability in the unlikely event of an adverse reaction occurring when using one of its products.

We do not claim that our products cure or prevent any disease or medical problem and do not intend to substitute other therapy or medical advice. The statements made on our website have not been approved by the Food and Drug Administration. 

Our products contain oils and butter from natural nuts, seeds, and fruits. If you have any allergies consult with your doctor before ordering. Please read our product description carefully. We recommend that people with sensitive skin perform a patch test first to ensure that there is no reaction.

Beware that sea moss is an alga. If you are allergic to shellfish please consult with your healthcare professional. In the case of pregnancy, nursing, illness, if taking medications, please consult with your health care professional.

Hi all! Feel free to reach out to ask any questions or let us know if you have any issues. We will reply in a timely manner of 1-3 business days. Stay cozy 😊

settings.title: CARE INSTRUCTIONS:
settings.text: Easy & care-free! Toss your CozyPooches in the wash on cold & tumble dry separately at a low temperature. Your CozyPooches will come out like new!

settings.title: Returns
settings.text:
Our policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have gone by since your purchase, unfortunately we can’t offer you a refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

settings.title: TO COMPLETE YOUR RETURN, WE REQUIRE A RECEIPT OR PROOF OF PURCHASE.
settings.text:
Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted (if applicable)

- Book with obvious signs of use

- CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened

- Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error

- Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

settings.title: Refunds (if applicable)
settings.text:
Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

settings.title: Late or missing refunds (if applicable)
settings.text:
If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at cozypoochesshop@gmail.com

settings.title: Sale items (if applicable)
settings.text: Only regular priced items may be refunded, unfortunately sale items cannot be refunded.

settings.title: Exchanges (if applicable)
settings.text: We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at cozypoochesshop@gmail.com

settings.title: REFUND POLICY:
settings.text:
Make sure we receive your item(s) back within 30 days to be eligible for a refund. Just a heads up, you are responsible for sending the item(s) back to us and will be charged a return & restocking fee.  Once we receive your item(s), it takes about 3-10 business days for the money to be credited to your account.

If your Cozypooches does not arrive in perfect condition, please reach out to cozypoochesshop@gmail.com within 30 days so we can assist you!

settings.title: SHIPPING:
settings.text: We know you needed your CozyPooches yesterday, so we process orders in 1-2 business days. Depending on what shipping method you select, that is when you will receive your CozyPooches. An email will be sent to you once your item(s) depart on their journey to you.

settings.title: INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING:
settings.text: No free shipping on any international orders.

settings.title: TAXES:
settings.text: Did you notice the sales tax charge on your receipt email? This is governed by the state that you live in.

settings.title: shopify ecommerce community
settings.text: Join the Shopify exclusive e-commerce community. The community's purpose is to educate, motivate and empower you. This community is for entrepreneurs who have an online business and struggling to scale their business. Membership is limited to 30 students.

settings.subtitle: hire us today
settings.title: SHOPIFY EXPERTS for entrepreneurs
settings.text: Hire us to design your Shopify website. We take all the hard work off your hand. Not only do we build your website we actually teach you how to use your Shopify website.

settings.title: Website DESIGN
settings.text: Whether creating a new website or modernizing an existing one, our team of qualified website designers provides a range of custom website solution packages to accommodate your needs.

settings.text: Our social media marketing packages are made to assist brands in managing their social media profiles and online presence.

settings.text: Create a new or more clearly defined brand identity and boost your brand authority with our brand design packages ideal for businesses.

settings.subtitle: Shopify experts
settings.title: We are a SHOPIFY agency
settings.text: We specialize in building ecommerce brands that elevate your authority, establish your identity, and enhance your sales. From creating custom Shopify website experiences to optimizing search engine rankings for increased traffic to developing customizable digital marketing solutions, we have the expertise, strategies, partnerships, and tools you need to grow online.

settings.title: Certified Professionals
settings.text: We are certified marketing experts, brand specialists, copywriters, and web developers ready to take your business to the next level.

settings.title: Customized Approach
settings.text: We understand that every business is unique, and we believe that a one-size-fits-all approach just doesn't cut it.

settings.title: Results-Oriented
settings.text: At the end of the day, what matters most is results. We're committed to delivering results that help you achieve your business goals.

settings.title: Fast Delivery
settings.text: We understand that time is of the essence when it comes to online marketing. That's why we pride ourselves on delivering fast and efficient service.

settings.title: Scalable Solutions
settings.text: We provide customizable solutions built around your needs and budget, designed to scale with your growing business.

settings.title: Unparalleled Service
settings.text: We believe great customer service is the key to greater success. Our number one priority is to provide an excellent experience for our clients.

settings.title: Book A Free Consultation
settings.text: Struggling to launch, acquire customers, increase sales, or scale your business? Our Shopify experts and marketing specialists are here to assist you in discovering the best solution for you to move forward. Ready to take that first step? Schedule a complimentary consultation.

settings.title: eBOOKS
settings.text: Our knowledge base glossary of ecommerce topics and insights was designed and developed to empower you to unlock the growth of your online store.

settings.title: COURSES
settings.text: Our self-paced courses are designed to educate busy business owners on various e-commerce subject matters and best practices.

settings.title: WORKSHOPS
settings.text: Our live and on-demand workshops simplify the principles and processes required to build a strong ecommerce business.

settings.title: EDUCATION RESOUCRES
settings.text: Learn & Grow your b

settings.subtitle: Our Commitment To Excellence
settings.title: aneka grandison
settings.text:
“We are committed to providing the highest quality services, productions, solutions, and resources to our clients to scale their ecommerce businesses online. As the founder of The Ecomm Builder, I understand the challenges and complexities involved in growing a successful online business, having worked hard to build a multi-six figure business on Shopify myself. "We value your trust and the opportunity to serve you in reaching your business goals.”

--Aneka Grandison

settings.title: EXPLORE OUR PROCESS IN MORE DETAIL
BRANDING AWARENESS, AUTHORITY, & AMPLIFICATION
settings.text: Our branding services help increase the brand awareness and identity for our clients through a combination of social media marketing, public relations, and effective marketing efforts concentrating on brand messsaging and positioning to create their visual identity and presence. Our team is incredibly skilled in refreshing current brands or creating new ones from conception.

settings.title: WORK WITH OUR BRANDING EXPERTS
settings.text: Looking to build or revamp your branding to establish your identity in your desired marketplace? Our branding experts can hep you in creating a strong and memorable brand to differentiate you from your competitors and stand out to an audience that matches your ideal buyer profile. Let our team help you establish a unique brand positioning roadmap for your business. Pick your package below to get started.

settings.title: Return On Investment.
settings.text: You deserve to get the biggest bang for your buck. We offer monthly reports detailing in depth user demographics, acquisition, and engagement statistics based on Facebook’s inbuilt pay-per-click advertising model. We turn leads into conversions and have fun doing it!

settings.title: DYNAMIC CONTENT MARKETING SERVICES
settings.text: Whether your business is expanding its brand, launching new products, exploring new audiences, or facilitating customer retention, our team knows how to create content that connects to your audiences, commands attention, and converts into sales.

settings.title: INTUITIVE CONTENT WRITING THAT CONNECTS & CONVERTS
settings.text: Are you tired of writing your own content? Hiring a content writer can free up your time so you can focus on your business. We have a team of experienced writers who are experts in their field, so you can be sure that your content will be of the highest quality, original, SEO-focused, engaging, and informative.

settings.text: You deserve to get the biggest bang for your buck. We offer monthly reports detailing in depth user demographics, acquisition, and engagement statistics based on Facebook’s inbuilt pay-per-click advertising model. We turn leads into conversions and have fun doing it!

settings.subtitle: WHY YOU NEED
settings.title: SEO TO GROW AN ONLINE BUSINESS
settings.text: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) is the process of improving the visibility and ranking of a website on search engines. By optimizing your website's technical configuration, content relevance and link popularity, you can make your pages easier to find, more relevant, and more popular towards user search queries. As a result, your website will rank better in search engine results pages (SERPs).

settings.subtitle: INCREASE YOUR WEBSITE
settings.title: WEBSITE RANKING ON GOOGLE
settings.text: Is your business ranking on Google? If it isn’t, you’re missing out on untapped potential regarding revenue and new customers. Our SEO experts can help you find the best keywords for your business with the highest likelihood of generating conversions. We help you target your marketing efforts to what your key customers are actually searching for, bringing them to you before any of your competitors.

settings.text: You deserve to get the biggest bang for your buck. We offer monthly reports detailing in depth user demographics, acquisition, and engagement statistics based on Facebook’s inbuilt pay-per-click advertising model. We turn leads into conversions and have fun doing it!

settings.subtitle: Custom Websites Built
settings.title: Around User Experience
settings.text: We specialize in building ecommerce websites using Shopify’s platform and interface that takes your product or service to the forefront of your ideal buyers’ mind with clear navigation, product or service placement, and seamless webflow that emphasizes the value of your online store from a UX perspective to increase sales volume and upsells.

settings.subtitle: Responsive, Interactive, Visual
settings.title: Website Design Intergrations
settings.text: The intangibles of a website that drives traffic, engagement, sessions, and conversions comes down to load time, responsiveness across desktop and mobile, and visual and interactive elements. We know what apps and Shopify integrations will elevate your website user interface that makes it effortless to identify what a buyer wants, reinforces its value, and clearly find items and price making it easy to purchase.

settings.text: We produce customized digital marketing services that aligns with your unique business needs. We become an extension of your team, a partner that understands your market and goals, and develop a full-turnkey array of custom marketing solutions that meeds all of your needs.

settings.title: PPC ADVERTISING SERVICES
settings.text: If you're looking to take your marketing efforts to the next level, pay per click advertising is a great option. With this type of marketing, you are able to target specific individuals with your ads. This can be a great way to reach new customers or increase traffic to your website. Facebook, Instagram, Google, has billions of activer users, so why not take advantage?

Our team of experts can take over and design a plan that is perfect for your business. Schedule a call today to get a customized plan.
